did.unittitle: Crusade for Freedom - Rockefeller Center, New York City, Funding Campaign for the Purchase of Transmitters, Campaign Against Communism; 11 September 1951; Radio Free Europe Fact Sheet, 8 Pages; Background Information, Brochure, 2-Page-Excuse to National Council of Churches of Christ in America Re: Lack of Mention of This Church in the Fight for Freedom - Columbia Broadcasting System (CBS) TV Show, Washington, D.C.; 23 September 1951; Excerpts of Speech of 13 September 1951, 2 Pages
